definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: rinse, cleanse away by rinsing, washing (NH Hiph., Aram. Aph. id.; cf. As. dîḫu Dl:Pr 177)—

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. sf. [[הדיחנו]] Kt Je 51:34 Qr [[הֱדִיחָָנִי]] but rd. [[הִדִּיחני]] fr. [[נדח]] (Hi, cf. Je 50:17); Impf. 3 ms. [[יׇדִיחַ]] Is 4:4; 3 mpl. [[יׇדִיחוּ]] 2Ch 4:6 + Ez Eze 40:38 (Co conj. [[הַקָּדִים]]);—
rinse, victims to be offered in sacrifice Ez Eze 40:38, so 2Ch 4:6 (cf. supr.)
fig. cleanse by washing Is 4:4, of removing guilt.
